last_episode_to_air.name: Thank You for Watching the Show
last_episode_to_air.overview: In this epilogue, K.O. finds his life moving unexpectedly fast, as he begins missing moments in his life. As many of his friends and family grow up and move on, he begins to suspect that a villain is behind this odd conundrum. However, no matter how many villains he faces, he cannot keep things from changing. He learns to accept that he needs to grow up and move on in life. A final montage plays depicting what became of everyone, ending with K.O. becoming the new owner of the Bodega and signing off with "Thank you for watching the show!"

name: OK K.O.! Let's Be Heroes
overview: Animated comedy set in the futuristic year of 201X, where the world is populated by video game and manga-esque characters.

episodes.name: Let's Be Heroes
episodes.overview: When K.O. tags along with his mom to work, he discovers the convenience store next door is his key to becoming a great hero.

episodes.name: Let's Be Friends
episodes.overview: K.O. wants to be as heroic as his new friends Rad and Enid and decides the way to do so is to sneak into Lord Boxman's lair and take him on by himself.

episodes.name: You're Everybody's Sidekick
episodes.overview: K.O. sets out to prove to Enid that helping people is rewarding, but then he meets some kids who take advantage of his helpful nature.

episodes.name: We Messed Up
episodes.overview: K.O., Rad and Enid accidentally break one of Mr. Gar's prized possessions!

episodes.name: Jethro's All Yours
episodes.overview: K.O. battles one of Lord Boxman's robots all by himself, only to be faced with bigger and bigger versions of, before learning that they share something in common.

episodes.name: You're Level 100!
episodes.overview: When K.O. finally gets a Hero Card, he finds out he's level 100, instantly making him a celebrity and the idol of everyone.

episodes.name: Sibling Rivalry
episodes.overview: When a new robot, Raymond, defeats the three heroes to steal the sign to Gar's, K.O. teams up with Darrell and Shannon to get it back.

episodes.name: I Am Dendy
episodes.overview: K.O. helps a strange girl from school, Dendy, get the parts she needs to repair her high tech backpack.

episodes.name: Do You Have Any More in the Back?
episodes.overview: Rad claims to know everything, which impresses K.O. and annoys Enid. However, his knowledge is put to the test when the group must venture into the mysterious backroom.

episodes.name: My Dad Can Beat Up Your Dad!
episodes.overview: K.O. gets into a verbal fight with Chameleon Jr. ending in a rendezvous between their parents. While Carol tries to resolve things peacfully, Chameleon Sr. isn't so willing.

episodes.name: You Get Me
episodes.overview: Enid gets turned to stone by a Wizard because he believes she displayed rude behavior towards him. K.O. tries his best to turn her back to normal, as he thinks he is the only one who can because he "gets her".

episodes.name: You Are Rad
episodes.overview: When K.O. forgets his name tag, Rad lets him use his, resulting in everyone thinking K.O. is Rad. Along the way, K.O. discovers some personal things about Rad causing him to think that there's more to him than he puts off.

episodes.name: Just Be a Pebble
episodes.overview: K.O. is tired of being small, so Rad gives him a candy bar that can increase his size. However, K.O. soon realizes that being big isn't all it's cracked up to be, when he accidentally hurls Mr. Gar's car keys in the sewer while trying to help him (due to his increased size), and must shrink to be able to retrieve them.

episodes.name: Presenting Joe Cuppa
episodes.overview: Joe Cuppa, Lakewood Plaza Turbo's local comedian, is all washed up and jobless. K.O., Rad and an unenthusiastic Enid try to help by hiring him to work at Gar's, which is just in time for Shannon's attack on the Bodega.

episodes.name: We've Got Pests
episodes.overview: K.O. and Rad must run the Bodega and take care of themselves while Enid hangs out with 3 tiny pest-like self proclaimed cool kids that break in through the pipes.

episodes.name: Legends of Mr. Gar
episodes.overview: Rad and Enid reminisce about when they started working at the Bodega, and discovered how amazing Mr. Gar really is. Later, Crinkly Wrinkly barges in to tell the tale of the Plaza's origin.

episodes.name: Know Your Mom
episodes.overview: After some misdirection from Brandon, K.O. decides to reunite Carol with one of her archenemies for Mother's Day.

episodes.name: We're Captured
episodes.overview: Boxman captures K.O., Enid and Rad, but seems a little distracted.

episodes.name: Face Your Fears
episodes.overview: Our heroes play an arcade game that makes them face their greatest fears.

episodes.name: Everybody Likes Rad?
episodes.overview: When Rad posts a video that goes viral, he tries to milk his 15 minutes of fame.

episodes.name: You Have to Care
episodes.overview: When an old friend of Enid's comes to town, she gets the opportunity to right an ancient wrong.

episodes.name: Plaza Prom
episodes.overview: When Rad throws his own prom at the Plaza, K.O. tries to makes sure it goes off without a hitch.

episodes.name: Second First Date
episodes.overview: Love is in the air and Cupid arrives to resolve romantic tension around the plaza.

episodes.name: One Last Score
episodes.overview: K.O. decides to help Ginger recapture her glory days.

episodes.name: T.K.O.
episodes.overview: Searching for power, K.O. accepts the help of a mysterious figure; the heroes band together to save the plaza from a new menace.

episodes.name: Stop Attacking the Plaza
episodes.overview: Boxman must go 24 hours without attacking Lakewood Plaza Turbo.

episodes.name: We've Got Fleas
episodes.overview: K.O., Rad, and Enid have to think outside the box to defeat Mikayla, a new animalistic robot.

episodes.name: No More Pow Cards
episodes.overview: When K.O. realizes Pow Cards exclude Dendy due to her Kappa heritage, he’s devastated by the clear discrimination. So the two of them decide to sneak into the factory that makes the Pow Cards to see if they can change it.

episodes.name: A Hero's Fate
episodes.overview: When a long-lost hero stumbles into Gar’s, K.O. agrees to help him complete his years long quest.

episodes.name: Let's Have a Stakeout
episodes.overview: K.O. joins Mr. Gar on a stakeout.

episodes.name: K.O.'s Video Channel
episodes.overview: When Rad and Enid discover that K.O. has been posting embarrassing videos online, they force him to erase them.

episodes.name: Rad Likes Robots
episodes.overview: Rad finds love in an unexpected place.

episodes.name: The Power Is Yours
episodes.overview: When Lord Boxman is trashing the Plaza with pollutants, K.O., Rad, and Enid recruit Captain Planet to help.

episodes.name: Glory Days
episodes.overview: K.O. does a school report on Carol.

episodes.name: Plazalympics
episodes.overview: K.O. takes part in Lakewood Plaza Turbo's annual Plazalympics competition.

episodes.name: We Got Hacked
episodes.overview: While trying to fix a malfunctioned mop, K.O. clicks a pop-up on Dendy's "hackpack", causing a glitch virus to invade the Bodega and infect shoppers into glitched CGI zombies.

episodes.name: Parents' Day
episodes.overview: It’s Parents' Day at Lakewood Plaza Turbo!

episodes.name: Back in Red Action
episodes.overview: Enid teams up with Red Action to take on a menace from the future.

episodes.name: Let's Take a Moment
episodes.overview: Mr. Gar and Carol fight a villain from their past.

episodes.name: Villains' Night Out
episodes.overview: Lord Boxman forces his way into an exclusive Villains party.

episodes.name: Villains' Night In
episodes.overview: While Boxman and Venomous are out, Fink is reluctantly babysat by Darrell and Shannon.

episodes.name: Let's Watch the Pilot
episodes.overview: K.O., Rad, and Enid watch the Lakewood Plaza Turbo pilot.

episodes.name: Mystery Science Fair 201X
episodes.overview: K.O. helps Dendy with her science fair project.

episodes.name: RMS & Brandon's First Episode
episodes.overview: A Real Magic Skeleton discovers a new job opportunity.

episodes.name: Lad & Logic
episodes.overview: K.O. learns the story of how Mr. Logic came to the plaza.

episodes.name: OK Dendy! Let's Be K.O.!
episodes.overview: Dendy fills in for K.O. at the bodega.

episodes.name: Plaza Shorts
episodes.overview:
K.O.'s monologue details his journey to being a hero.

Dynamite Watkins reports on a day at Gar's.

Lord Boxman explains where all the robots come from.  K.O., Rad, and Enid try to figure out Mr. Gar's adventure.

Enid and Rad switch jobs.

episodes.name: Let's Not Be Skeletons
episodes.overview: When a charismatic huckster shows up to the plaza, the product he’s selling turns everything upside down.

episodes.name: Action News
episodes.overview: Dynamite Watkins has to go extreme lengths breaking a new story.

episodes.name: The Perfect Meal
episodes.overview: K.O. teams up with Beardo to make the perfect meal for Carol.

episodes.name: Hope This Flies
episodes.overview: Rad attempts to upgrade his van and make it fly.

episodes.name: You're in Control
episodes.overview: Dendy tries helping K.O. control T.K.O. while Lord Boxman reveals his progeny.

episodes.name: Seasons Change
episodes.overview: When our heroes return from time off, KO is horrified to discover that things have changed.

episodes.name: Lord Cowboy Darrell
episodes.overview: Everyone is forced to deal with some major changes at Boxmore.

episodes.name: Plaza Film Festival
episodes.overview: When the plaza has its own film festival, KO, Enid and Rad are sure their entry will win!

episodes.name: Be A Team
episodes.overview: Mr. Gar brings in some team building experts to help KO, Enid and Rad.

episodes.name: My Fair Carol
episodes.overview: KO, Enid and Rad team up to help Carol out with a special occasion.

episodes.name: Let's Watch The Boxmore Show
episodes.overview: Our heroes discover that the Boxmore security camera feed is the most entertaining thing ever.

episodes.name: Your World Is An Illusion
episodes.overview: KO tries to help a hero in need and ends up needing some help of his own.

episodes.name: The So-Bad-Ical
episodes.overview: When a new substitute shows up, KO and Dendy decide they need to get their old teacher back.

episodes.name: Are You Ready for Some Megafootball?
Crossover Nexus
episodes.overview: In the Cartoon Network City, K.O. is summoned by the villain Strike who plans on eradicating all the heroes from the Cartoon Network Universe. Now K.O. must team up with Garnet from Steven Universe, Ben Tennyson from Ben 10 and Raven from Teen Titans Go! to stop him.

guest_stars.character: Four Arms / Jake the Dog / Shnitzel
guest_stars.name: John DiMaggio

episodes.name: We Are Heroes
episodes.overview: K.O., Rad and Enid are now full time heroes at the Bodega, with new hires replacing their old positions. Mr. Gar and Carol send the trio out while Dendy acts as their off sight support. While everyone is happy with the new set up, K.O. feels that he is not contributing much and is concerned when a dragon begins attacking Ted Viking and Foxy's house.

episodes.name: K.O., Rad, and Enid!
episodes.overview: When Dynamite Watkins confronts K.O., Rad and Enid on their team name, they realize that they do not have one. They decide to come up with some sort of gimmick, with Drupe's help, so that they can think of a cool name. However they cannot decide on their costumes which is made more infuriating when Raymond arrives to once again mock them.

episodes.name: T.K.O. Rules!
episodes.overview: Carol decides to let K.O. take care of himself for the day while she is out. As a friendly gesture, K.O. visits T.K.O. inside his brain and they decide to switch places for fun. However, T.K.O. ends up being rowdy and breaking all the rules that Carol has set up. As K.O. realizes the error he has made, he is forced to make a harsh decision against T.K.O.

episodes.name: Chip's Damage
episodes.overview: As the public wonders what has become of Chip Damage, Elodie recruits K.O. in reactivating the Chip Damage robot in an attempt to improve on him and bring hope back to everyone. In their haste, they end up damaging Chip Damage's image and it takes an intervention from retired hero, Dr. Greyman, to remind them what makes an actual hero.

episodes.name: K.O. vs. Fink
episodes.overview: K.O. loves his mom Carol, but Fink arrives to turn that all around by making fun of him and calling him a "mama's boy". Feeling miserable, K.O. gets help from his "inner monologue," which is actually Shadowy Figure, to get even with Fink by getting angry. K.O. channels his anger to battle her, but it only seems to make her even more malicious.

episodes.name: The K.O. Trap
episodes.overview: K.O., Rad, and Enid break into Boxmore to get back their doors when they find themselves in a box shaped room that does not have any doors or windows. As they wait it out, they begin to realize that something is not right. Rad and Enid are, in fact, replaced with goo clones and K.O. must now get to the bottom of this mysterious situation.

episodes.name: Whatever Happened To... Ripper Roo?
episodes.overview: Rippy Roo makes a sudden appearance at the plaza and immediately begins catching up with Carol by revealing what she had been doing all these years after leaving P.O.I.N.T. Meanwhile, K.O. ventures into Rippy Roo's pouch after a creature called a Mecha Maw steals his prized binder of very rare Pow Cards.

episodes.name: Planet X
episodes.overview: Rad goes to Planet X to join his family reunion. Upon arriving he is shocked to discover that the majority of his family are nerds. He later learns that his grandfather, Coach, is a jock and that X-ians have been split into nerds and jocks after humans visited the planet years ago and shared many of their existing culture with them.

episodes.name: Deep Space Vacation
episodes.overview: Noticing that K.O. and Enid are sad that Rad is still on Planet X, Mr. Gar gives them his old space bike and tells them to take a vacation. The two arrive only to learn that the shape shifting Cosma has devoured the planet whole. As K.O. and Enid desperately attempt to rescue the planet from being digested, Rad and his family do not seem to care.

episodes.name: Let's Meet Sonic
episodes.overview: The Bodega is unexpectedly visited by Sonic the Hedgehog and Miles "Tails" Prower, who aid K.O. in rescuing his friends from Lord Boxman. As Sonic tries to help K.O. with new techniques, Tails feels left out especially when Sonic starts calling him his "little buddy". When K.O. gets roboticized, Sonic must return him to normal.

episodes.name: Big Reveal
episodes.overview: Carol casually reveals to K.O. that Laserblast is his father. He is excited at the prospect that he has "hero blood" in him and takes on another mission from Mr. Gar to confront Lord Boxman and Professor Venomous. However, Venomous reveals that he is K.O.'s father and soon a distraught Carol arrives to learn the origin of his villainous transformation.

episodes.name: Radical Rescue
episodes.overview: Rad starts feeling uncomfortable when K.O. begins exhibiting negative behavior that he picked up from him, Mega Football Baby and Bellbeefer. He tries to hide his love for kittens as well as him volunteering at the local animal shelter. When Mikayla infiltrates the shelter and begins attacking everyone, Rad has to convince K.O. to drop the macho thing.

episodes.name: Let's Get Shadowy
episodes.overview: Carol drops K.O. off at Boxmore for the weekend so that he can spend time with Professor Venomous. K.O. is disappointed to learn that Venomous is nothing at all like him, so he suggests that they look for Shadowy Figure so that they can "destroy" him. As they look for clues on where he might be, Fink is holding a secret back about her villainous boss.

episodes.name: You're A Good Friend, K.O.
episodes.overview: When the power goes out at school, K.O. and Dendy go out and investigate. K.O. feels bad for Dendy because the other students continuously praise him, but look down on her. They discover that Small Calf Demon is behind the power outage, but when K.O. gets kidnapped by him, Dendy must step into action and use her techno abilities to defeat the villain.

episodes.name: Red Action 3: Grudgement Day
episodes.overview: Rad and Red Action once again get caught in a feud. Getting annoyed at how far their bickering has gotten, K.O. and Enid use Red Action's time travel belt to travel to the past to make sure that the two do not bicker with one another. When they cannot find the problem, Rad finally reveals that it involved the events of "You're Everybody's Sidekick".

episodes.name: Carl
episodes.overview: K.O. once again is spending time with Professor Venomous in an attempt to bond with him. He creates Carl, a gelatinous blob-like creature, but it ends up getting loose, forcing the two to chase it down. As Venomous starts to become distant from the whole ordeal, K.O. begins to suspect that something is up, resulting in T.K.O. taking charge.

episodes.name: Dendy's Video Channel
episodes.overview: Sometime after the previous episode, T.K.O. and Shadowy Venomous have become a terrifying duo laying waste to everything. Dendy attempts to cheer everyone up to no avail. When Lord Boxman is kicked out of Boxmore, he abandons his bots as he feels that he can no longer provide for them, resulting in Dendy recruiting them as the Plaza's new saviors.

episodes.name: Let's Fight to the End
episodes.overview: The Pow Card company decides to hold a tournament with T.K.O. joining for his and Shadowy Venomous' own nefarious scheme. Rad and Enid join in to rescue their friend and stop the villains once and for all. Shadowy Venomous manages to secure the glorb tree for himself and plans to drain the powers of all the heroes in the world. K.O. fights his way out of T.K.O.'s mind and discovers a hidden memory that could very well save his and everyone else's lives.

episodes.name: Thank You for Watching the Show
episodes.overview: In this epilogue, K.O. finds his life moving unexpectedly fast, as he begins missing moments in his life. As many of his friends and family grow up and move on, he begins to suspect that a villain is behind this odd conundrum. However, no matter how many villains he faces, he cannot keep things from changing. He learns to accept that he needs to grow up and move on in life. A final montage plays depicting what became of everyone, ending with K.O. becoming the new owner of the Bodega and signing off with "Thank you for watching the show!"
